verses.verse: <S%H5782>Awake<s%>, <S%H5782>awake<s%>; put <S%H3847>on<s%> your <S%H5797>strength<s%>, O <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; put <S%H3847>on<s%> your <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>: for henceforth there shall no <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into you the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> and the <S%H2931>unclean<s%>.

<S%H5287>Shake<s%> yourself from the <S%H6083>dust<s%>; <S%H6965>arise<s%>, and sit <S%H3427>down<s%>, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: <S%H6605>loose<s%> yourself from the <S%H4147>bands<s%> of your <S%H6677>neck<s%>, O <S%H7628>captive<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, You have <S%H4376>sold<s%> yourselves for <S%H2600>nothing<s%>; and you shall be <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> without <S%H3701>money<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, My <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H7223>aforetime<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>live<s%> <S%H804>there<s%>; and the Assyrian <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> them without <S%H657>cause<s%>.

Now <S%H5002>therefore<s%>, what have I here, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, that my <S%H5971>people<s%> is taken <S%H3947>away<s%> for <S%H2600>nothing<s%>? they that <S%H4910>rule<s%> over them make them to <S%H3213>howl<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> every <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H5006>blasphemed<s%>.
Therefore my <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%>: therefore they shall know in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that I am he that does <S%H1696>speak<s%>: behold, it is I.

How <S%H4998>beautiful<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> are the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of him that brings good <S%H1319>news<s%>, that <S%H8085>publishes<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>; that brings good <S%H1319>news<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%>, that <S%H8085>publishes<s%> <S%H3444>salvation<s%>; that <S%H559>says<s%> unto <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, Your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4427>reigns<s%>!

Your <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> shall lift <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%>; with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> shall they <S%H7442>sing<s%>: for they shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> to <S%H5869>eye<s%>, when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall bring <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.

Break forth into <S%H6476>joy<s%>, <S%H7442>sing<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, you waste <S%H2723>places<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5162>comforted<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, he has <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has made <S%H2834>bore<s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%>; and all the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>.

<S%H5493>Depart<s%> <S%H5493>you<s%>, depart <S%H3318>you<s%>, go you out from <S%H5060>there<s%>, touch no <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H3318>thing<s%>; go you out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H1305>her<s%>; be you clean, that <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

For you shall not go <S%H3318>out<s%> with <S%H2649>haste<s%>, nor <S%H3212>go<s%> by <S%H4499>flight<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>you<s%>; and the God of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will be your <S%H622>rear<s%>.
<S%H5650>Behold<s%>, my servant shall deal <S%H7919>prudently<s%>, he shall be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> and <S%H5375>extolled<s%>, and be <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1361>high<s%>.

As <S%H7227>many<s%> were <S%H8074>astonished<s%> at <S%H4758>you<s%>; his visage was so <S%H4893>marred<s%> more than any <S%H376>man<s%>, and his <S%H8389>form<s%> more than the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>:

So shall he <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>; the <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H7092>shut<s%> their <S%H6310>mouths<s%> at <S%H5608>him<s%>: for that which had not been told them shall they <S%H7200>see<s%>; and that which they had not <S%H8085>heard<s%> shall they <S%H995>consider<s%>.
